content.question: The cost, in dollars, to paint <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> square feet of a house is modeled by the differentiable function <math alttext="C of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>C</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>. Which of the following is the best interpretation of the statement <math alttext="C prime of 300, equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>300</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: The cost of painting <math alttext="6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> square feet is <math alttext="300 dollars" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>300</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The cost of painting <math alttext="300" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>300</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> square feet is <math alttext="6 dollars" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The cost of painting <math alttext="300" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>300</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> square feet is <math alttext="6 dollars" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> per square foot.

When <math alttext="300" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>300</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> square feet have been painted, the cost to paint the next square foot is approximately <math alttext="6 dollars" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: When <math alttext="300" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>300</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> square feet have been painted, the cost to paint the next square foot is approximately <math alttext="6 dollars" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

topic.text: 4.1: Interpreting the Meaning of the Derivative in Context
